doc.description:
Meteo sensor board from Enac (absolute and differential pressure, temperature, humidity) aka Meteo Stick.
Raw meteo data: - Pressure (absolute and differential) in ADC (ADS1220) - Temperature in ADC (ADS1220) - Humidity in ticks (period of the input signal)
When using SEND_MS flag, scaled pressure, temperature and humidity data are sent over telemetry with the PAYLOAD_FLOAT message (array of float). If scale factors and offset are not specified, raw values are sent (scale=1.0, offset=0).
When using LOG_MS flag, raw pressure, temperature and humidity data are stored with raw gps data (position, speed, time, status). Field names and units are in the first line of the log file.

configure.name: MS_PRESSURE_SLAVE_IDX
configure.description: Index of the SPI slave for absolute pressure

configure.name: MS_DIFF_PRESSURE_SLAVE_IDX
configure.description: Index of the SPI slave for differential pressure

configure.name: MS_TEMPERATURE_SLAVE_IDX
configure.description: Index of the SPI slave for temperature

configure.name: MS_HUMIDITY_PWM_INPUT
configure.description: Select PWM input channel for humidity sensor

define.name: MS_PRESSURE_OFFSET
define.description: Offset in ADC of the absolute pressure sensor

define.name: MS_PRESSURE_SCALE
define.description: Scale factor of the absolute pressure sensor

define.name: MS_TEMPERATURE_OFFSET
define.description: Offset in ADC of the temperature sensor

define.name: MS_TEMPERATURE_SCALE
define.description: Scale factor of the temperature sensor

define.name: MS_HUMIDITY_OFFSET
define.description: Offset in micro seconds of the humidity sensor

define.name: MS_HUMIDITY_SCALE
define.description: Scale factor of the pressure sensor

define.name: MS_DIFF_PRESSURE_OFFSET
define.description: Offset in ADC of the differential pressure sensor

define.name: MS_DIFF_PRESSURE_SCALE
define.description: Scale factor of the differential pressure sensor

define.name: LOG_MS
define.description: Log data on SD card (ascii format, raw PTU data + GPS data)

define.name: SEND_MS
define.description: Send data over telemetry (PAYLOAD_FLOAT message, scaled PTU data)

makefile.raw: MS_SPI_DEV_UPPER=$(shell echo $(MS_SPI_DEV) | tr a-z A-Z) MS_SPI_DEV_LOWER=$(shell echo $(MS_SPI_DEV) | tr A-Z a-z)
